ovdesc.p: This is a central file used to maintain activity or rule based charge details for an arrangement. This file has two purposes.
1. Maintains history of charges applied for an arrangement.
2. Gives information needed for the system to raise charge bills.

desc.p: This field specifies the arrangement activity ID of the Activity which raised this charge for the arrangement. This is used as a link for raising charge bills.
The ID of CHARGE.DETAILS is made up of the Arrangement.ID-Charge.ID. Here Charge.ID is the charge property ID.
Bill amount to be raised in arrangement currency. This amount is updated when charge is calculated for an activity or when a rule is broken. This will be used to update the bill when it is issued.

Bill amount to be raised in local currency. This amount is updated when charge is calculated for an activity or when a rule is broken. This will be used to update the bill in local currency amount when it is issued.
Specifies the charge bill ID.
This field specifies the type of the bill to be raised. This can be either Activity based charges (ACT.CHARGE) or periodic rule based charge (PR.CHARGE).
Defines the charge amount calculated at tier level
Defines the periodic charge property type. If periodic property evaluation results into a credit then this field would be updated as CREDIT. Otherwise it would be null.
Defines the charge amount after considering FREE.AMT
Defines whether the charge is fixed or calculated. It can have either FIXED or CALCULATED
This field specifies the arrangement activity ID of the Activity which raised this charge for the arrangement. This is used as a link for raising charge bills.
Calculated charge amount for the activity charge property. It is associated to ARR.ACTIVITY.ID and BILL.TYPE.
Calculated charge amount in local currency for the activity charge property. It is associated to ARR.ACTIVITY.ID and BILL.TYPE.
For future use to hold default charge.
For future use to hold default charge in local currency.
Defines the charge amount after applying MIN.CHG.AMT
Defines the amount to be deducted from the calculated charge amount
Defines the minimum charge for the total charge amount computed.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Specifies the bill due date. This will be same as issue date when Due period is null.
Defines the base balance used for charge calculation
This field holds the total of adjusted amounts and this is an associated sub-value set of BILL.ID
Defines the balance applied to tier calculation
Defines the charge amount calculated at tier level after considering the minium and maximum definition
Defines the Rate/Amount/Units used for the calculation
Defines the maximum charge amount applicable for the tier
Defined the minimum charge amount applicable for the tier
Defines the sum of tier charge amount
Charge waive amount (for future use)
Charge waive amount in local currency (for future use)
Defines the waived amount
This field holds the reason for waiving the charge.
This is an associated sub-value set for BILL.ID set of attributes.
This field holds the Local currency equivalent of total adjusted amounts and this is an associated sub-value set of BILL.ID
This field holds the adjusted charge amount as part of Charge Override Routine attached in the charge condition.
Charge adjustment may happen in either way INCREASE/DECREASE from the actual system calculated/Fixed charge amount.
This field will hold the text message if anything returned from the charge adjustment routine(Local routine) as part of the adjustment process.
Bill amount in arrangement currency.
Bill amount in local currency.
This field denote which application method should be taken while applying charges.The allowed values are DUE or CAPITALISE
Specifes the period for the charge bill to be made due or capitalise. Period can be in days, weeks, months or years.Standard T24 period field.
If charge is made due/cap on the date of issue then this field should be updated as zero.
